intro.title: Early Passion for Lego
intro.description: From a young age, my fascination with Lego ignited my creativity. At the age of 4, I constructed a minion using just a few Lego pieces. My passion for building and programming with Lego grew further when my dad gifted me a Lego Classic kit, followed by a Lego Boost kit from my grandpa. With the Boost kit, I delved into programming motors and sensors, enabling me to create moving robots through block programming. To share my Lego creations with others, I even started a YouTube channel called Anirudh's Toys Review.

intro.title: Exploring Advanced Robotics and Programming
intro.description: My journey into advanced robotics began with the discovery of the Lego Mindstorms kit. With Mindstorms, I could build intricate robots and program them using Python with EV3Dev. This introduction to text-based programming and AI sparked my curiosity, and I've since completed over 100 projects utilizing technologies like OpenCV, TensorFlow, GPT, and Azure AI. Demonstrating my expertise, I became the youngest individual to achieve certifications in Microsoft Powerplatform and Azure AI. Additionally, I've explored no-code/low-code app development, web apps, and other technologies like Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and Linux.

intro.title: Real-World Collaborations and Research
intro.description: I had the incredible opportunity to collaborate with Bosch, a global technology and services provider, on an AI-based autonomous car project. This experience allowed me to apply my skills and knowledge to tackle real-world challenges and make a meaningful impact. Furthermore, I authored a research paper on face swapping for autonomous cars, delving into complex issues such as privacy and AI bias in relation to autonomous vehicles.

intro.title: Sharing and Engaging with the Community
intro.description: During my leisure time, I enjoy listening to electronic music and showcasing my creations on my personal website and various social media platforms. I actively engage with like-minded individuals on Replit, Twitter, and LinkedIn, where I share my thoughts and ideas.

Furthermore, my participation in the prestigious AI 4 Youth program by Intel further solidified my expertise, culminating in the successful development of a pioneering AI and ML project, reflective of my boundless enthusiasm for pushing the boundaries of technological progress and leaving an indelible mark on the ever-evolving landscape of innovation.
